content: I have a Flipper Zero for sale. This is an amazing multi-tool device designed for hackers, pentesters, and hardware enthusiasts. If you're into infosec, you will definitely appreciate this powerful gadget. I have decided to sell it as I am looking to fund another project of mine.Item: Flipper ZeroCondition: Like New, barely usedPrice: 0.01 .0075 BTCShipping: Worldwide, Buyer paysEscrow: Accepted, buyer pays feesFeatures:Tamagotchi-like interface with a mission system433/315/868/915 MHz transceiver for radio protocolsRFID reader and writer for 125 kHz & 13.56 MHz cardsInfrared transceiver for remote controlUSB HID device emulationGPIO, I2C, SPI, 1-Wire, and UART interfacesOpen-source firmware and hardwareWhat's included:Flipper Zero deviceOriginal packaging and boxUSB Type-C cableQuick-start guideSome relevant extras included. Payment:I accept Bitcoin (BTC) only. The price includes shipping to your location. Please note that customs fees, taxes, and other charges specific to your country are not included in the price.Shipping:I will ship the device within 48 hours after the payment has been confirmed. Shipping will be done using a reliable courier service with tracking information provided. Delivery time will depend on your location and the shipping service used. Buyer Pays.Escrow:I am willing to use escrow services at the buyer's expense. If you would like to use an escrow service, please let me know and we can make the necessary arrangements.Contact:If you're interested in purchasing this or have any questions, please send me a private message or reply to this thread.
